content:
TITLE: Starting Storybook for UI Primitive Development
DESCRIPTION: Command to launch Storybook for working on UI primitives, which will be accessible at http://localhost:4400.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spartan-ng/spartan/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm run storybook
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building All Projects with Nx
DESCRIPTION: Command to build all Spartan projects locally using Nx build system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spartan-ng/spartan/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Jest Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute Jest tests for all projects in the monorepo.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spartan-ng/spartan/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm run test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Development Server with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: Alternative command to start the development server using PNPM.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spartan-ng/spartan/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Note Table in Supabase
DESCRIPTION: SQL script to create the 'note' table in the Supabase database.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spartan-ng/spartan/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: sql
CODE:
```
create table
  public.note (
    id bigserial,
    title text not null,
    content text null,
    created_at timestamp with time zone null default current_timestamp,
    constraint notes_pkey primary key (id)
  ) tablespace pg_default;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Web Crawler Access in robots.txt
DESCRIPTION: This robots.txt configuration allows all web crawlers to access all content on the site and points them to the sitemap location. It uses standard directives like 'User-agent', 'Allow', and 'sitemap' to guide crawler behavior.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spartan-ng/spartan/blob/main/apps/app/src/public/robots.txt#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: robots.txt
CODE:
```
User-agent: *
Allow: /

sitemap: http://localhost:4200/sitemap.xml
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Spartan Button Styles in Angular
DESCRIPTION: Example of applying SPARTAN styles to a button element using the hlmBtn directive in Angular template syntax.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spartan-ng/spartan/blob/main/libs/ui/README.md#2025-04-19_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<button hlmBtn >...</button>
```

----------------------------------------

```
Secondary entry point of `@spartan-ng/brain`. It can be used by importing from `@spartan-ng/brain/alert-dialog`.
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
